thread.title: Soulja Boy Taunts Chris Brown Over Boxing Match, Says He Won't Sign Contract
thread.title_full: Soulja Boy Taunts Chris Brown Over Boxing Match, Says He Won't Sign Contract

author: NHHMS
title: Soulja Boy Taunts Chris Brown Over Boxing Match, Says He Won't Sign Contract
text:
http://www.billboard.com/files/styles/promo_225/public/media/soulja-boy-serious-bet-awards-2015-billboard-1548.jpg 
After Soulja Boy and Chris Brown hurled insults and threats to each other on social media last month, the two are supposed to settle things with a boxing match. But now Soulja Boy is claiming Brown is getting cold feet and won’t sign a contract for the event. 
Soulja Boy tweeted on Sunday (Feb. 19) that Brown is scared of him and went in on the singer. Eventually he decided that since Brown apparently doesn’t want to fight him, he’s going to leave him alone and said their beef was over. But, of course, he suggested his Twitter followers still go after Brown. 
The timing of Soulja Boy’s claims are convenient, as the Atlanta rapper also announced he would be dropping his new Big Soulja mixtape Sunday night. 
Billboard has reached out to Soulja Boy’s rep for comment. See his tweets below. Can’t believe this nigga scared to fight me sign the contract Bitch Ass nigga set up the boxing match ——– 
— Soulja Boy (@souljaboy) February 19, 2017 I caught two fades in the streets since this whole beef shit and I won both fights I guess Chris must heard and got scared lol come on boy 
— Soulja Boy (@souljaboy) February 19, 2017 Nigga talked all that Shit just to back down and not sign the paper work. Not about that life. No action. Don’t wanna hear about this ever — 
— Soulja Boy (@souljaboy) February 19, 2017 Now we all know Chris a Bitch don’t bring this shit up to me ever again. He ain’t wanna see these hands. Facts 
— Soulja Boy (@souljaboy) February 19, 2017 Obviously he don’t wanna fight — , so I’m gonna leave him alone. Beef over just tell him don’t call my phone over a girl. That was 2nd time 
— Soulja Boy (@souljaboy) February 19, 2017 I couldn’t wait to knock that nigga out now about y’all tweet him and ask why he bitched out? I’m back to the studio. With yo bitch–✋– 
— Soulja Boy (@souljaboy) February 19, 2017 TAGS
